question: Analyze the social media engagement of companies in the technology industry and identify trends over time.
subtasks: [{"step":1,"task":"Collect engagement metrics for companies in the technology industry from different social media platforms.","table":["CompanyInfo","CompanyFacebookDetail","CompanyTwitterDetail","CompanyInstagramDetail","CompanyYoutubeDetail"]},{"step":2,"task":"Filter companies based on their industry type from the CompanyInfo table to focus only on the technology sector.","table":["CompanyInfo"]},{"step":3,"task":"Aggregate engagement data across all social media platforms to identify top-performing companies and evaluate trends over different periods.","table":["CompanyFacebookDetail","CompanyTwitterDetail","CompanyInstagramDetail","CompanyYoutubeDetail"]},{"step":4,"task":"Visualize the trends identified in social media engagement over time for better analysis and reporting.","table":["CompanyFacebookDetail","CompanyTwitterDetail","CompanyInstagramDetail","CompanyYoutubeDetail"]}]}
